parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description: The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2848162~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application. Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: GroupStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the groups to query. Default value: 0. Valid values:

*   0: all groups
*   1: existing groups
*   2: deleted groups

parameters.name: NextPageToken
parameters.description: The starting page number for the query. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the first page.

parameters.name: SortType
parameters.description:
The sort order based on the time when the groups were created. Valid values:

*   1: ascending order
*   2: descending order
